SEARCH
Package grafioschtrader.repository

Class ImportTransactionTemplateJpaRepositoryImpl

java.lang.Object
grafiosch.repository.BaseRepositoryImpl<ImportTransactionTemplate>
grafioschtrader.repository.ImportTransactionTemplateJpaRepositoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
BaseRepositoryCustom<ImportTransactionTemplate>, ImportTransactionTemplateJpaRepositoryCustom
public class ImportTransactionTemplateJpaRepositoryImpl extends BaseRepositoryImpl<ImportTransactionTemplate> implements ImportTransactionTemplateJpaRepositoryCustom
Implementation of custom repository operations for import transaction template management and processing.

This implementation class provides the core business logic for managing import transaction templates, which serve as parsing rules for converting raw financial data from various sources (CSV files, PDF documents) into structured transaction records. The class handles template validation, storage, retrieval, and sophisticated parsing operations against multiple template formats.

Key Capabilities

Template Validation and Processing

Provides comprehensive template validation ensuring templates are syntactically correct and contain all required parsing rules before storage. Supports both CSV and PDF template formats with format-specific validation logic.

Multi-Format Template Support

  • CSV Templates: For parsing structured comma-separated value files with configurable column mappings and data transformation rules
  • PDF Templates: For extracting transaction data from PDF statements using text pattern matching and regular expressions

Template Lifecycle Management

Supports complete template lifecycle including creation, validation, export for backup/deployment, and bulk import with detailed success/failure tracking. Templates are versioned by date and support multiple languages for international trading platforms.

Platform Integration

Enables seamless integration with various trading platforms by providing template export/import capabilities with standardized filename formats for easy identification and deployment across different environments.

    • getPossibleLanguagesForTemplate

      public List<ValueKeyHtmlSelectOptions> getPossibleLanguagesForTemplate()
      Description copied from interface: ImportTransactionTemplateJpaRepositoryCustom
      Retrieves all available languages that can be used for template creation and localization. This method provides a comprehensive list of supported locales, enabling users to create templates for different language-specific trading platform formats.

      The returned language options are:

      • Filtered to unique language codes (avoiding duplicates)
      • Displayed in the user's locale for better usability
      • Sorted alphabetically for easy selection
      Specified by:
      getPossibleLanguagesForTemplate in interface ImportTransactionTemplateJpaRepositoryCustom
      Returns:
      List of language options suitable for HTML select elements, containing language codes as keys and localized language names as display values

    • getCSVTemplateIdsAsValueKeyHtmlSelectOptions

      public List<ValueKeyHtmlSelectOptions> getCSVTemplateIdsAsValueKeyHtmlSelectOptions(Integer idTransactionImportPlatform)
      Description copied from interface: ImportTransactionTemplateJpaRepositoryCustom
      Retrieves CSV template identifiers and descriptions as HTML select options for a specific platform. This method provides a user-friendly list of available CSV templates that can be used for import operations, displaying both template IDs and descriptive purposes.

      The returned options include:

      • Template ID as the option value for form submissions
      • Combined template ID and purpose as the display text
      • Only templates associated with the specified platform
      Specified by:
      getCSVTemplateIdsAsValueKeyHtmlSelectOptions in interface ImportTransactionTemplateJpaRepositoryCustom
      Parameters:
      idTransactionImportPlatform - The platform ID to retrieve templates for
      Returns:
      List of HTML select options with template IDs and descriptions for user selection

    • getTemplatesByPlatformPlanAsZip

      public void getTemplatesByPlatformPlanAsZip(Integer idTransactionImportPlatform, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Description copied from interface: ImportTransactionTemplateJpaRepositoryCustom
      Exports all templates for a specific platform as a ZIP archive for backup or deployment purposes. This method creates a downloadable ZIP file containing all templates associated with the specified platform, formatted with standardized filenames that include metadata for easy identification.

      The ZIP archive contains:

      • All templates for the specified platform
      • Standardized filenames: category-format-date-language.tmpl
      • Template content with purpose information embedded
      • Proper HTTP headers for file download

      Filename format example: accumulate-csv-2024-01-15-en.tmpl

      Specified by:
      getTemplatesByPlatformPlanAsZip in interface ImportTransactionTemplateJpaRepositoryCustom
      Parameters:
      idTransactionImportPlatform - The platform ID whose templates to export
      response - HTTP response object for streaming the ZIP file to the client

    • uploadImportTemplateFiles

      public SuccessFailedImportTransactionTemplate uploadImportTemplateFiles(Integer idTransactionImportPlatform, org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile[] uploadFiles) throws Exception
      Description copied from interface: ImportTransactionTemplateJpaRepositoryCustom
      Uploads and processes multiple template files for a specific platform with detailed result reporting. This method handles bulk template upload operations, parsing filenames for metadata, validating template content, and creating or updating template records with comprehensive error tracking.

      Upload processing includes:

      • Filename parsing for template metadata (category, format, date, language)
      • Template content validation and purpose extraction
      • Duplicate detection and update handling
      • Permission validation for template ownership
      • Detailed success/failure tracking for each file

      Expected filename format: category-format-date-language.tmpl

      Example: dividend-pdf-2024-01-15-de.tmpl

      Specified by:
      uploadImportTemplateFiles in interface ImportTransactionTemplateJpaRepositoryCustom
      Parameters:
      idTransactionImportPlatform - The platform ID to associate uploaded templates with
      uploadFiles - Array of template files to process and import
      Returns:
      Detailed statistics about the upload operation including success counts and error categories
      Throws:
      Exception - if critical errors occur during template processing or validation
